creator: jerome@dieselsprout.com
text:
When attempting to download Win 32 Apache from the site, (either MSI installer or zip file) I am redirected to opensourceresources where it fails with both a forbidden directory error and 404 error.

I then attempted to create a new user account for myself at open source resources, and saw several error messages.  In addition, never received their new account authentication e-mail (or any e-mail) it appears some of that functionality is also broken on their end.

Need Apache so I can build an awesome app and impress my boss.

Please advise.

Thanks!

Jerome

From where are you downloading ?

On http://httpd.apache.org/download.cgi#apache24, the Windows version is not available yet.
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr

text:
Seems to have gotten fixed.

This was for Apache 2.2.

Needed it for a remote server; tried again after a few hours and it worked.

Thanks!
creator: jerome@dieselsprout.com
